findings.rationale: A duration of five years may be insufficient for certain sensitive information, potentially exposing parties to risks if information leaks after this period.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond may expose parties to risks of unsubstantiated claims leading to unwarranted injunctions.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment without consent may limit flexibility in business operations, especially during mergers or acquisitions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
